description: This file defines a minimal Confluence client class with initialization and a stub search method.

classes.name: ConfluenceClient
classes.description: A minimal stub class for interacting with Confluence API, including initialization and page search.

methods.name: __init__(self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None)
methods.description: Constructor initializing the ConfluenceClient with optional base_url and access_token.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] search_pages(self, query: str)
methods.description: Asynchronous method to search pages with a query, returns a stub dictionary with pages and query.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None):$/
ctags.signature: (self, base_url: str | None = None, access_token: str | None = None)

ctags.name: search_pages
ctags.pattern: /^    async def search_pages(self, query: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
